title: Using the Store Issue
body:
Good day to whomever may read this,

I have been having an issue with the Store front interface while on the OCE server, in that when I go to the store page it is black with blue hyperlinks,(see image), and I am unable to use the store itself to buy stuff, however if I go to the champion page of player side I can purchase champions and skins, by going to the champion and picking the options, and even get the RP, so the purchasing options are working, just not the store front.

After trying most of the help I was able to find on fixing the store and trying it I have been unable to fix the store, on a whim, I tried going to the NA server, I found that the store front works perfectly fine while on the NA server, but when I switch back to OCE I am unable to use it, I am not sure what to do to solve this issue.

replies.body:
Well, the way the store functions, it's directly linked to your Internet Explorer (at least if you're using Windows, dunno about Mac). Make sure that your Internet Explorer is working fine. If that's no dice and you can't figure out why the store is messed up, reset your Internet Options (accessible from Internet Explorer itself) to defaults and you should be fine.

If that doesn't fix it, send in a support ticket. You said it's working fine for NA so your Internet settings may have nothing to do with the issue. Best of luck with it.
